This is because you and

Exercises	for	a	fitter	
pregnancy
Try	to	fit	these	exercises	into	
your daily routine. They will 
strengthen your muscles 
so that you can carry extra 
weight, make your joints 
stronger, improve your 
circulation, ease backache 
and generally make you feel 
well.
Stomach-strengthening 
exercises
